title: Book Recommendation: A Hobbit a Wardrobe and a Great War
description:
Some of you have asked for a recommended book list. I haven't done one yet, sorry, but here is a book I can recommend especially if you love Tolkien or CS Lewis or are a history buff for the First World War. I just finished it this morning. It is in print, on Kindle and there is a wonderful Audible version. See the links below. 

https://www.amazon.com/Hobbit-Wardrobe-Great-War-Rediscovered/dp/B01LP2GR08/ 

https://www.audible.com/pd/Bios-Memoirs/A-Hobbit-A-Wardrobe-and-a-Great-War-Audiobook/B013174Y0U
